sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import './Crypto.css' import StockMiniChart from './stock_mini_chart.svg' export class Crypto extends React.Component { render() { const {name, image, id, current_price, price_change_percentage_24h, symbol} = this.props.crypto return (

{name}

{symbol.toUpperCase()}

${current_price}

{price_change_percentage_24h.toFixed(2)}%

) } } export default Crypto
